text: Jerzy Skolimowski (, born 5 May 1938) is a Polish movie director, screenwriter, dramatist and actor. Skolimowski has directed more than twenty movies since 1960. His first movie was Oko wykol (The Menacing Eye). Skolimowski was born in Łódź, Poland.
